name: Rhubarb-Carrot Relish
keywords: carrot, mustard seed, rhubarb, side dish, spring
recipeIngredient: 1 large carrot, peeled and cut into chunks
About 1 1/2 pounds rhubarb, cleaned, trimmed, peeled if necessary, and diced, about 2 1/2 cups

recipeInstructions.text: Set two pots of salted water on the stove and bring each to a boil. Cook the carrot pieces in one pot for 15 to 20 minutes, or until soft. Cook the rhubarb in the other pot for 3 to 5 minutes, or just until tender.
When the rhubarb is done, drain it, and crush it with a fork or potato masher. When the carrot pieces are done, drain; then, purée them.
Combine the rhubarb, carrot, mustard seeds, and butter or oil. Serve at room temperature with steamed fish, or grilled chicken or meat.
